name: Verify if Sysnr parameter has invalid value then connection is not established

statusDetails.message:
Expected: a string containing "Exception caused due to Missing/Invalid parameters"
     but: was "Exception caused due to network problems, connection breakdowns, gateway problems, inavailability of the remote SAP system, etc."
statusDetails.trace:
java.lang.AssertionError: 
Expected: a string containing "Exception caused due to Missing/Invalid parameters"
     but: was "Exception caused due to network problems, connection breakdowns, gateway problems, inavailability of the remote SAP system, etc."
	at org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat(MatcherAssert.java:20)
	at org.junit.Assert.assertThat(Assert.java:956)
	at org.junit.Assert.assertThat(Assert.java:923)
	at sapadapter.stepDefinetions.stepDefSNC.primaryMesaageIsValidatedWithConnectionForSNCConnection(stepDefSNC.java:60)
	at ✽.Primary mesaage is validated with "missingInvalidParameterPrimaryMessage" connection for SNC connection(src\test\java\features\sncConnection.feature:117)

steps.name: Given  Base Url "connectionTestSNC" is known for SNC connection
When  Following parameters are inserted with GET request as header when Sysnr is "c" for SNC connection
Then  SNC connection API call got success with status code 503
Then  Primary mesaage is validated with "missingInvalidParameterPrimaryMessage" connection for SNC connection
